summary: Page 30 (book page 50/nun). Covers continuation of section 112, then sections 113-118. All section numbers are correctly sequential. The page stays within the 'צדקה וגמילות חסדים' topic area. Section 118 continues to the next page.

issues.description: The source ref has a leading vav prefix: 'ובית נפתלי ראה'. Source refs should not include conjunctive prefixes. Should be 'בית נפתלי ראה'.
The third body paragraph of section 118 has no source_ref. It starts with 'ובחנוני נא בזאת...' and the text continues to the next page, so the source ref likely appears there.
